channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: COMPLETE - Cliff Rescue; INC#1239; 08:34PM; 2201 W Warmouth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/433gJY7; #SanPedro; Ground-based LAFD firefighters, including those specially trained and equipped for Urban Search and Rescue, were able to safely utilize a harness and rope system to safely access and lower the stranded though uninjured 52 year-old male - and his (unknown age/breed) pet dog, from the steep cliff behind his home, to the beach 30+ feet below. They will be assisted to walking to the cliff top and their home via a nearby trail.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA36 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88 + LACoFD Baywatch Lifeguards; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Cliff Rescue; INC#1239; 07:30PM; 2201 W Warmouth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/433gJY7; #SanPedro; LAFD land, air and sea rescuers are at scene. Plan A: ground-based LAFD firefighters, including those specially trained and equipped for Urban Search and Rescue, will commence ground-based rope rescue of the uninjured 52 year-old male, who remains stranded on a precarious seaside cliff behind his home. The current status of his dog, that he was attempting to rescue from the steep terrain, has yet to be determined.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA36 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88 + LACoFD Baywatch Lifeguards; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue; INC#1239; 07:02PM; 2201 W Warmouth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/433gJY7; San Pedro; PRELIM: LAFD land, air and sea response to an uninjured adult male resident who became stranded on a precarious seaside cliff behind his home during his attempt to rescue his dog (pet's current status undetermined).; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA36 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1371; 08:05PM; 1212 S Flower St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nvlDfY; Downtown; Firefighters are systemically clearing the smoke from each floor. There is no active fire. It appears there was a small fire in a trash chute which was extinguished by the automatic fire sprinklers. There are no injuries reported and no damage to the structure. There are no occupants displaced. No further details. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E203 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T3; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - High Rise; INC#1371; 07:41PM; 1212 S Flower St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nvlDfY; Downtown; 35 story hi rise building (residential over parking) with a water flow (sprinkler activation) on the 5th floor parking. Firefighters are checking for possible trash chute fire and investigating the residential floors for any smoke (smoke alarms activated in various areas of the building). There are no injuries reported. Firefighters are in the investigation mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E203 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T3; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0675; 11:40AM; 3000 Reseda Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zm7hkX; Pacific Palisades; LAFD Air Ops located a 43yo female hiker with a non-life threatening injury. Due to the remote location, they will conduct a hoist operation and transport. The 9-1-1 call was received at 11:40AM. No further details.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC10 E109 E293 E93 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA84 RH114 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0674; 11:53AM; 11460 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mrk4uf; Mar Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 13 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to a laundry room with no extension. Occupants are being sheltered in place while firefighters place blowers to ventilation the residual smoke on both residential floors. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E263 E43 E62 RA62 T63; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0674; 11:40AM; 11460 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mrk4uf; Mar Vista; Three story (two residential over parking) apartment building with smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E263 E43 E62 RA62 T63; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0578; 10:50AM; 8930 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KrKjPN; Panorama City; KNOCKDOWN 46 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The garden style apartment building is two stories in the front and 3 (two over parking) at the back. The fire was in one unit on the 3rd floor. Firefighters contained the blaze to the unit of origin with both adjacent apartments protected from damage. The primary search of the occupancy is clear with no victims located. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E105 E239 E275 E290 E298 E39 E88 EM15 RA7 RA81 T39 T75 T90 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0578; 10:34AM; 8930 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KrKjPN; Panorama City; Two and (part) three story garden style apartment building with fire in one unit on the 2nd floor. One additional task force was requested while resources were enroute due to a visible loom up (meaning the smoke was visible above the structure from a distance). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E105 E290 E298 E88 RA7 RA81 T90 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
